longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Luxembourg must be valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Luxembourg. However, passport is required when accompanied
  by minors who do not have their own travel documents. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- All minors who are nationals of Luxembourg are expected to
  hold their own travel document.
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Luxembourg will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay as follows:
  - at least EUR 100.- per day of stay; or
  - at least EUR 50.- per day of stay if holding a confirmed
  invitation or a tourist voucher
